name: Public Institution Development Agency of Osijek-Baranja County, Croatia
goal:
* drafting the County Development Strategy and other strategic and development documents for the County and their implementing documents authorized by the founder,
* checking the compliance of the County's strategic development planning documents with the hierarchically higher strategic planning documents and making decisions confirming their compliance,
* providing expert assistance in the preparation and implementation of support programs for public bodies and public institutions from the territory of the County founded by the Republic of Croatia or the County, in the preparation and implementation of development projects of interest for the development of the County, and in particular projects co-financed by EU structural and investment funds
* providing expert assistance in the preparation and implementation of development projects of public bodies and public institutions from the territory of the County founded by the Republic of Croatia or units of local and regional self-government which are of interest for the development of the County, as well as joint development projects of interest for multi-county development,
* implementation of county development programs authorized by the founder
* implementation of programs of the ministry and other central state administration bodies related to more balanced regional development
* Registration of development projects of importance for the County development in the central electronic register of development projects
* coordinating the registration of other public bodies in the central electronic register of development projects,
* Checking and monitoring the status of projects of all users from the County in the central electronic register of development projects
* performing expert and advisory tasks in connection with the implementation of the County Development Strategy and other strategic, development and implementation documents for the County and reporting to the founders and the competent Ministry on their implementation
* cooperating with the Ministry and all other relevant stakeholders in strategic planning and development management for the County,
* coordinating the activities of local self-government units in the County in relation to regional development,
* performing administrative and professional tasks for the needs of the county partnership,
* participation in the work of partner councils,
* issuing guarantees for obtaining economic loans
* to perform other tasks within the scope of its public authority established or delegated by special regulations
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Joint Representation of Osijek-Baranja, Vukovar-Srijem, Brod-Posavina, Virovitica-Podravina and Požega-Slavonia counties from Croatia as united regions in front of the European institutions with a purpose to:

- informing the countys and its regional coordinators of the European Union grant applications in which the counties, public authorities and public authorities in the county are eligible applicants and / or partners,
- inform the county and its regional coordinators of relevant developments and opportunities to participate in projects
- enable the use of the Agency's Brussels office for the activities of the counties, its regional coordinator, public authorities and public authorities from the counties' territory in connection with projects and activities directed towards the EU institutions,
- assisting in seeking potential partners in front of EU institutions
- organising professional practices and professional training for the needs of county employees and related institutions
- maintaining contacts with EU Members and their assistants, officials or other staff of EU institutions,
- preparing, sending and delivering letters, information material or documents for discussion and taking a stand in front of EU institutions for the purposes of regional public interest,
- organising events, meetings, promotional activities, conferences or social events and send invitations to EU Members and their assistants, officials or other staff of EU institutions,
- voluntarily contribute to and participate in formal consultations or hearings on envisaged legislative acts or other legal acts of the EU and participation in other open consultations
